summary: An email from Lesley Groff to an unnamed recipient, scheduling a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein at his New York City home on July 8, 2010. The document is marked as subject to a protective order.

events.title: Scheduled Meeting at Epstein's Home
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for Jeffrey Epstein at his New York City home at 5:00 PM.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY (between 5th and Madison Avenues)
keyFacts: The document is an email from Lesley Groff scheduling a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein in July 2010, after his 2008 conviction.
It confirms Epstein was using his New York City residence (9 East 71st Street) for meetings post-conviction.
The document is explicitly marked as subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs, indicating it was part of legal proceedings.
The recipient's name is redacted or omitted, noted only as 'Hello .' in the 'To:' field.
